result.purpose: Responsible for managing various entities related to the discovery module, including announcements, collections, contacts, events, feature banners, home banners, layouts, products, and service items.
result.architecture: The folder follows a repository pattern, encapsulating data access logic for different entities within the discovery module.

internal/repositories/discovery/announce.purpose: Defines the Announcement repository interface and its implementation for managing announcements in the discovery module.

internal/repositories/discovery/collecti.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing collections in a discovery service.

internal/repositories/discovery/contact..purpose: Defines a repository for managing contact-related data in a discovery service.

internal/repositories/discovery/event.go.purpose: Defines an interface and implementation for managing event-related database operations.

internal/repositories/discovery/feature_.purpose: Defines the FeatureBanner repository interface and its implementation for managing feature banners and headlines in a database.

internal/repositories/discovery/generic..purpose: Defines a generic repository for managing social platforms and studios in a database.

internal/repositories/discovery/home_ban.purpose: Defines the HomeBanner repository interface and its implementation for managing home banners in a database.

internal/repositories/discovery/layout.g.purpose: Defines a repository for managing layout entities and their associated widgets in a discovery service.

internal/repositories/discovery/product..purpose: Defines a product repository interface and its implementation for managing product data in a database.

internal/repositories/discovery/service_.purpose: Defines a repository for managing service items in a discovery context using GORM.
